description: Send money to friends, pay bills and buy online, recharge your phone, or pay at the nearby café with Google Pay, a simple and secure payments app by Google.

name: phonepe
features: Pay at shops and offline stores
Recharge your mobile and DTH connection
Use your favourite Apps on PhonePe Switch
Manage and track refunds from shopping websites
description: PhonePe is a payments app that allows you to use BHIM UPI, your credit card and debit card or wallet to recharge your mobile phone, pay all your utility bills and also make instant payments at your favourite offline and online stores.

Link your bank account on the PhonePe app and transfer money with BHIM UPI instantly. The PhonePe app is safe and secure, meets all your payment and banking needs, and is much better than Internet banking. No need to remember IFSC codes, account numbers, or other details. Make instant bank transfers with BHIM UPI by just using a mobile number or a unique payment identity – your Virtual Payment Address (VPA).
